r.d: This is a DataSource driver for Structures_DataGrid using Excel spreadsheets. It requires that the package Spreadsheet_Excel_Reader is installed (not available as a PEAR package, but via Sourceforge: http://sourceforge.net/projects/phpexcelreader).
r.n:
Initial release.
Please note the warning about the die() statement in Spreadsheet_Excel_Reader on the manual page for this driver.
